title: Drawing, "Study: Peonies", early 20th century
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and Chinese white on yellow tracing paper.
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 13
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting two peony blossoms with stalks that cross.  The blossom on the left has been drawn in pen and ink; that at right, in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study: Peonies", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and Chinese white on yellow tracing paper.. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-21.
